ROW.DATDSC: SELECT ID,name,somny,taxmny,taxman,decode(stat,3,'处理','未处理') from( select b.id ID,b.name name,sum(b.somny) somny,sum(b.taxmny) taxmny,max(b.taxman) taxman from (select a.yymm,b.id,b.name,a.elemny from tax_eledata a,tax_company b where a.usrid=b.ammno and a.eleqty<>0) a, (select a.yymm,a.id,b.name,a.somny,a.taxmny,b.taxman from tax_taxdata a,v_tax_company b where a.id=b.id and b.ammno is not null ) b where a.id(+)=b.id and a.yymm(+)=b.yymm and a.id is null and b.somny !=0 group by b.id,b.name order by somny desc ) a, tax_trkhdr b where a.ID=b.cmid(+)
